name: Aya's Journey
description: Aya has set on a journey, hoping to get out of this dark and eerie world. Will she be able to find the peaceful world she seeks, or does another nightmare awaits her?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB or higher Storage: 90 MB available space
